title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Spotsylvania Exhibit Shelter
body: Virtual Tour Stop, Spotsylvania Exhibit Shelter        Immediately upon entering the battlefield, there is an open air shelter of exhibits. The shelter is manned daily during the summer season and most weekends in the spring and early fall. When the shelter is not manned, visitors seeking information and maps should first go to the park visitor centers at Fredericksburg or Chancellorsville.           The shelter contains exhibits about the Battle of Spotsylvania Court House. Bathrooms are available at the shelter during normal daylight hours. A seven-mile loop trail begins at the shelter.        Upton's Road tour stop #2 on the battlefield   Proceed to Virtual Tour Stop, Upton's Road
